members.member: INFO: WCF tarafindan data contract olarak belirlenen siniflarda, autoproperty olmadiginda (ya da setter olmadiginda tam test etmedim), client'a connection reset gidiyor. Bu nedenle DataContract yazildiginda buna dikkat edilmeli. Zaman kaybi oluyor. -- cdeniz

member.name: T:Multinet.Framework.Web.Mvc.Attributes.MetadataProvider
member.summary: This MetadataProvider adds some functionality on top of the default DataAnnotationsModelMetadataProvider. It adds custom attributes (implementing IModelAttribute) to the AdditionalValues property of the model's metadata so that it can be retrieved later.
